subject: [Radiance-general] Bounces
body:
Maitha,

If you are using Radiance under UNIX, then a script to test for
convergence may help.  Have a look at the example in Section 6.4 of
the Radiance book.

Regards,

-John

Radiance 2006 Scientific Workshop, 13-14 (Wed-Thu) September, De
Montfort University, Leicester, UK.
http://www.iesd.dmu.ac.uk/~jm/radiance2006work.html
